Blog.post: xiao bai..my heart was broke for wad happened that broke hers..its over now..guess i will recover bah..but i found that my heart is make of glass..100% pure glass..its broke now..it will not be able to hold anything..nothing..no one..why is my heart make of glass..guess i rather not hold anything in my heart le bah..its too heavy..i reali dun have the str to..cant hold anything now..haiz..nvm..forget it..LIFE DUN END HERE..!!!work harder for myself..for everything that is waiting for me..work hard not to have anything in my heart..get everything out of my heart..get everyone out of my heart..tmr will be better..cya xiao bai..look forward to see a new real me without heart that is willing to hold anyone tmr bah..

xiao bai..i finally know how weak the heart of a human can be..haiz..she told me so many thing..i felt tired..reali tired..i decided to close my door from everyone now..i decided to protect my heart..i'm not letting anyone to enter now..no one..get away from my heart..dun touch it..dun lay any finger on it..i dun wan it to break..i reali dun..no more..i'm tired..bye xiao bai..*closed my eyes..away from pain..dun wana hurt*

xiao bai..i think i regreted..she asked me whos the her..but i din say its her..i din give her any clue that its her..will she ever know? will she give up hope? will she stop wad she's being doing? i hope she may know that its her..help me tell her..xiao bai
xiao bai..2day my store manager told me that he wan to promote me to manager le..he ask me to think about it..lets wait and see bah..and she..haiz..feeling depressed...i dun know..nvm..bye xiao bai

hehe..haha..hey hey..xiao bai..!!!today me dao all those i dun lyk in my class..and guess wad..i got back my maths paper..haha..i got 9/16 for E maths..not reali very impressive..too many careless..but my A maths got 13/15..hehe haha..got careless also leh..haha..and me and her..we..we did a few v wu liao thing..but i think both of us enjoyed it..guess its a gd day for me..work hard for better result and for her ^^..see ya xiao bai..gd luck to her and me too ^^

xiao bai..sth serious happened to me today..but i din know wad happen..idiots..my attitude will change..it had gone overboard..fun rite..xiao bai..let me tell u wad happened..today in maths lesson, my 2 idiot fren pull my arms back..they were like trying to kill me..using all their str..only i shout pain then they release..but wad happen after that is worst..i oni rmb that i touch my right shoulder..but then i started to feel numbed..my body..everywhere..my brain..freezed..the next thing i know..i was on the floor..my table fell..and everything so messy..idiots..the game is over..i lose..i hurted..but u guys get the punishment..ppl who dun care about me..i wont give a damn about them..*door closed..world of my own*..but i wished she was there with me..bye xiao bai..
heya...xiao bai..u are born on the same day as me ^^...but 17 years younger ^^

xiao bai..now i have 4 eyes loh..haha..got my specs liao..yay..me is weirdo..like to wear specs de..tmr gona test out my specs..^^ tmr got A maths test..die die loh..nv bring book home..haiz..beta go rest early bah..byebye

oh..haha xiao bai..wrong person le lah..ok..er..anyway..whos the guin. then? i dun thk i know right..and dun look down on urself lah..wad u suk..everyone is a winner..we won our chance to be born..winning millions of competitors..right? =p juz thk back..die die..got lots of hw..gota go do le..bye bye xiao bai

hey..xiao bai..the person say the name liao ah..ok ^^ thanks..but hor..lol..today mrs lim cut almost everyone's hair in my class leh..wah lao..lol juz coz of that few..then whole class get cut..but this give me the chance to have same haircut as alex and sam..we went for a haircut together..haha..now we look alike..cool right haha..see ya..next time tell u more
yay...!! xiao bai..mum back from China le..1 week is quite long..that person still dun tell u who he/she ah..nvm lah..its ok de..me headache..go rest le..bye
xiao bai..whos that person? he/she post so many comment for me..but i dun know who he/she..can u help me ask? i wana know..

aiyo..xiaobai..the survey is so so so boring leh..so many silly questions, waste time to do..my phy. test should be quite ok for this time bah..but i got write many careless things leh..aiyoyo..haiz..still early..i go play game first..bye
hey..xiao bai..whos that Anonymous? can u help me ask who is he/she? why should he/she be there for me? nvm..gota go doing the school survey now..bye

haiz..xiao bai..i recover le..i learnt to let go..and now oni school work is important..but my com got prob. le..got virus leh..the wad sasser thing..need someone to help..but no one seem to know how..die die..cant play game..so sian..every nite slp so early de..nvm..i go agn le..
